items.sentence: I'll be away for a while and expect to be back towards the end of next month.
If only her husband helped her, most of her problems at home would disappear.
Tom thought that it would be better to go talk to Mary than to just text her.
Tom was skeptical of Mary's business plan, but he kept an open mind about it.
I don't think that you're doing that as well as you could with a little help.
